intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: Well, this isn't at all how I pictured where your daughter lives. I didn't even know that any part of the Deeprealms looked so...ominous.

intro.speaker: Hayato
intro.line: It wasn't this creepy the last time I visited Rhajat. Something terrible has happened.

intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: Faceless, everywhere! They seem to be surrounding that house. Maybe even...coming from it?

intro.speaker: Hayato
intro.line: What? But that's where Rhajat lives. It can mean only one thing... She actually did it.

intro.speaker: Hayato
intro.line: Hmm. There's something I haven't told you about my daughter. She dabbles in the dark arts—the darker, the better. Last time I came here, Rhajat was amusing herself with summoning spells. But she couldn't get them to work.

intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: Hmm, I just can't believe that your daughter could possibly...

intro.speaker: Rhajat
intro.line: Hee hee hee! After all my toil, the Nohrian monstrosities are mine—ALL MINE!

intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: I guess I shouldn't have been surprised. She's got your knack for magic. It seems Rhajat has succeeded beyond her wildest dreams.

intro.speaker: Hayato
intro.line: More like her weirdest nightmares. We have to get in there and clean up this mess!

intro.speaker: Rhajat
intro.line: Come to me, my children! Come to Rhajat, your loving mother!

intro.speaker: Hayato
intro.line: Seriously? That girl...she's dabbled herself into a very dark place.

recruit-talk.speaker: Rhajat
recruit-talk.line: Hee hee hee! Father, you've arrived! Meet your grandchildren! Aren't you proud of me? I've mastered the art of summoning! The Faceless just keep on coming. It's so beautiful!

recruit-talk.speaker: Hayato
recruit-talk.line: What? This is horrifying! If you summon any more of them, we won't be able to cut them all down!

recruit-talk.speaker: Rhajat
recruit-talk.line: Huh? But I've only just begun. They're a part of our family, Father!

recruit-talk.speaker: Hayato
recruit-talk.line: Listen, you need to stop this. Now! Please, Father knows best.

recruit-talk.speaker: Rhajat
recruit-talk.line: What? How can you say that? You know NOTHING about summoning!

recruit-talk.speaker: Hayato
recruit-talk.line: Rhajat, you know that's not what I mean! Now, help us clean up this mess.

recruit-battle.speaker: Rhajat
recruit-battle.line: Hee hee hee! You truly want to tangle with me?!

recruit-battle.speaker: Rhajat
recruit-battle.line: But...why? I was only furthering my dark education!

end.speaker: Hayato
end.line: Well, we've cleaned up THAT mess. Now, Daughter, I've never discouraged you from dabbling in the dark arts... But do you have to pursue the worst possible spells?!

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: I have been working on a spell that makes a person taller and less baby faced.

end.speaker: Hayato
end.line: What? Are you really?

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: No, of course not!

end.speaker: Hayato
end.line: Very funny. Anyway, no more summoning. Understand?!

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: Huh? No way! My next spell is going to be a hundredfold more effective!

end.speaker: Hayato
end.line: Seriously?! What possesses you to do such things? In that case, I've got no choice. You're coming with us.

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: What? But this is my sanctum!

end.speaker: Hayato
end.line: If you're going to keep at these studies, then I've got to keep an eye on you. I fact, I'm going to take charge of your magical education.

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: I don't have a say in the matter, do I? All right, as long as you give me interesting challenges, Father.

end.speaker: Hayato
end.line: How about you start on that spell to make a person taller? That seems respectable!

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: Hmpf.

end.speaker: Subaki
end.line: Pardon the intrusion, but I've got some great ideas for research. How about a spell that makes a person less afraid of the dark? Or a cure for crying every time someone botches his battle moves?

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: Who would need that—you?!

end.speaker: Subaki
end.line: Oh, no, don't be silly. I mean your father here. I think he should focus more on being braver, not taller.

end.speaker: Hayato
end.line: Subaki, I'm braver than you are!

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: Hee hee hee! I'll get to working on those spells right away. After seeing you in action here, Father, I can see how I can really help. I think all your friends need my help too. Oh, this IS going to be fun!

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: I suppose it's time to take one last look at the inside of my dark sanctum. I won't miss it too much. It's just a home. The real darkness is inside me.

end.speaker: Faceless
end.line: Gurrr...

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: Huh? One of my children lived?

end.speaker: Facelss
end.line: GUUURRR!

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: N-n-no! I'm your mother!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Stop, abomination! Get away from her!

end.speaker: Faceless
end.line: GUURR...raaahh.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: That was a close one. Are you all right, Rhajat?

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: ... *urgh*

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: You are hurt, aren't you?!

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: You...what's your name?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Who, me? I'm Corrin.

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: You're this Corrin that Father's been talking about?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Er, yes?

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: Thank you for rescuing me, Corrin. I owe you my life. No one's ever been willing to sacrifice themselves for me before. I owe you my life. All of it. every hour, every day until the end.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Huh? That's, uh, not necessary.

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: You've got my full attention. I'll watch you like a hawk on a mouse. Forever and ever—until one of us is no more. And maybe then some. Your name is branded upon my mind's eye, Corrin.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: What a strange young woman. I guess that's just her way of saying thanks? Of course, she could have just said thanks. Odd one, that Rhajat.

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: You summoned me, Corrin?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Ack!

end.speaker: Rhajat
end.line: I'm here for you, should you need me. My dark arts are at your disposal. I will be close as your shadow. Actually...I will BE your shadow.
